document.heading: Estate and Inheritance Tax Clarification Temporary Act of 2004

history.narrative: Law 15-315, the “Estate and Inheritance Tax Clarification Temporary Act of 2004”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 15-1109, and was retained by Council. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 9, 2004, and December 7, 2004, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 4, 2005, it was assigned Act No. 15-712 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 15-315 became effective on April 8, 2005.
